title: Kaadhal Aasai Lyrics Anjaan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
kaadhal
aasai yaarai vittadho
un otrai paarvai
oodi vanthu uyirai thottadho

kaadhal
thollai thaanga villayea
Athai thatti keatka
unnai vittal yaarum illayea

Yosanai......... oh....oh.....
maarumo...... oh.... oh...
pesinaal..ohh..
theerumo.. ohh..
Unnil ennai pola
kaadhal nerumo

Oar kuzhandhayin
magilchiyai polavey.
Unnai vidumurai
dhinam ena parkiren.
Innilamayai thanimayai
nee maatru en neramea anbe.

Naan piradhathu
maranthida thondruthea
Un oru mugam
ulagamai kaanudhea.
Un oru thuzhi mazhayinil
theeratho.. en dhagamea.

kaadhal
aasai yaarai vittadho
un otrai paarvai
oodi vanthu uyirai thottadho

kaadhal
thollai thaanga villayea
Athai thatti keatka
unnai vittal yaarum illayea

Pagal iravu pozhigindra
pani thuligal nee thaaney.
Vayadhinai nanaikiraai
uyirinil inikiraai.

Ninaivugalai moikkadhey..
Nimida mullil thaikaadhey..
Alai yena gudhikirean
unnai ena kothikuren.

Veedu thaandi varuven
koopidum nerathil.
Unnal vikkal varudhey
yeazhu naal vaarathil..
yeazhu naal vaarathil..
Oru paarvai paaru kannin orathil

Oar kuzhandhayin
magilchiyai polavey.
Unnai vidumurai
dhinam ena parkiren.
Innilamayai thanimayai
nee maatru en neramea anbe.

Naan piradhathu
maranthida thondruthea
Un oru mugam
ulagamai kaanudhea.
Un oru thuzhi mazhayinil
theeratho.. en dhagamea.

Vizhigaliley un theadal
Sevigaliley un paadal.
Irandukum naduviley
idhayathin uraiyadal.

kaadhaluku vilaiyillai
Ethai koduthu naan vaanga.
Ullangayil alli thara
ennai vida ethum illai.

Yaarai keatu varumo
kaadhalin nyabagam.
Ennai paartha piragum
en intha thaamatham.
en intha thaamatham
Nee eppo solvaai
kaadhal sammadham.
